ValidationRule.description: validation rule to prevent Industrial Development user from editing the 'Field Sales Recommendation' field after the opportunity is closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled")), RecordType.DeveloperName='NSSales_609_1', $Profile.Name = 'NS Industrial Development Manager', ISCHANGED(NSSales_609_1_FieldSalesRecommendation__c) )
